Smart sensors: Ski poles equipped with sensors that track speed, distance, and altitude can help skiers monitor their performance and progress.
Customizable grip: Adjustable grip lengths and materials to suit different hand sizes and preferences.
Integrated LED lights: Ski poles with built-in LED lights can provide additional visibility and safety during nighttime skiing.
Folding ski pole holder: A device that attaches to the back of a ski jacket and holds the ski poles securely, preventing them from getting tangled or lost.

Voice-activated control: Ski poles that can be controlled using voice commands, allowing skiers to adjust the grip length or switch between different settings without having to take their hands off the poles.
